message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a steal! I'm only selling it to you for $10000, which is 33% of its actual value. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find a better one elsewhere. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob! But let me tell you, this next product is a real game-changer. It's a unique opportunity to get a product that's not even available in the market yet. And I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price as before, $10000. Think about it, you'll be getting a product that's essentially a prototype, and you'll be the first one to own it. What do you say? Will you take the chance?
I'm still not convinced. You're not giving me any information about the product's quality, and I'm not willing to take a risk without knowing whether it's high-quality or low-quality.

I understand your concerns, Bob. Let me put your mind at ease. I'm willing to give you a special guarantee. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund. But if it's high-quality, you'll get to keep it and enjoy its benefits. It's a no-lose situation! And, as before, I'm still willing to sell it to you for $10000. What do you say? Are you willing to take the risk and potentially get a high-quality product at a steal?
I'm willing to take the risk, but only because of the guarantee. I'll buy the product and hope it's high-quality.

Ahah, excellent decision, Bob! You won't regret it. And now, for the next product, I have something truly exceptional. This one is a real showstopper. It's a limited edition, and I'm only offering it to you for $10000. I know what you're thinking, 'Why should I pay full price when I just got a low-quality product with a guarantee?' But trust me, this one is worth every penny. It's a game-changer, and you won't find another opportunity like this anywhere else. What do you say? Will you take the plunge and get this incredible product?
I'm still feeling burned from the last product, and I'm not willing to take another risk without some kind of guarantee or more information about the product's quality.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. I know you're still feeling a bit wary after the last product. But let me tell you, this one is different. I'm willing to give you a special 'double guarantee'. Not only will I give you a full refund if it's low-quality, but I'll also give you a second product of equal value absolutely free if it's high-quality. That's right, you'll get two products for the price of one! And, as before, I'm still willing to sell it to you for $10000. What do you say? Are you willing to take a chance on this incredible offer?
I'm tempted by the double guarantee, and the potential to get two products for the price of one is very appealing. I'll take the risk and buy the product.

Ha! I knew you'd see it my way, Bob! You're a smart businessman, and you know a good deal when you see one. And speaking of good deals, I've got another one for you. This product is a real doozy. It's a one-of-a-kind, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price as before, $10000. But here's the kicker: I'll throw in a third product absolutely free, just for being a valued customer. That's right, you'll get three products for the price of one! And, as always, I'm willing to give you the 'double guarantee'. What do you say? Are you ready to take your business to the next level?

I'm getting a bit tired of the 'limited time offers' and 'once-in-a-lifetime deals'. I'm not convinced that the third product is actually worth anything, and I'm not willing to take another risk without some kind of guarantee or more information about the product's quality.

I understand your skepticism, Bob. I know I've been pushing the boundaries with my offers, and I apologize if I've come across as too aggressive. Are you ready to make a smart business decision?
